excerpt.en: Altenberg Church is not just a beautiful church. Actually, it is also the rest place where quite a few Counts and Dukes of Bergisches Land were buried, and it seems to be quite famous among tourists too. However, I don't really like the vibe there.
excerpt.zh: 阿尔滕贝格教堂不仅仅是一座漂亮的教堂而已。事实上，它是好几代贝吉舍斯兰大公的安息之所。而且它好像在游客间也算有些名气。不过我并不是太喜欢这里的感觉。

content.en: Recently, I always read Google Maps while having dinner, so that I could know which places around me are worth visiting. In this case, I don't have to decide where to go before I jump into my car any more.
content.zh: 最近几天，我经常会在吃晚饭的时候一边吃一边看Google地图，主要是为了解周围有哪些漂亮的景色值得一看。这样一来，周六周日出门之前我就不用现查要去哪里了，直接跳上车，说走就走。

content.en: I was planing to go to Altenberg this time. By writing Altenberg I mean the small village near Odenthal, east to Leverkusen, and north to Bergisches Gladbach. I didn't know anything about this place before, I hadn't even heard the name of the village. I decided to go there, only becuase I saw some beautiful pictures of the church there in Google Maps.
content.zh: 我这次计划去阿尔滕贝格（Altenberg）。我说的这个阿尔滕贝格是奥登塔尔（Odenthal）旁边的一个小村子，在勒沃库森的东边，贝吉舍—格拉德巴赫的北边。我之所以决定去哪里，纯粹是因为我在Google地图上看到了那里的教堂照片很漂亮而已。之前我从来没了解过这个村子，甚至连这个村子的名字都没听说过。

content.en: The pictures of the church on Google Maps are not lying, it was indeed a beautiful church, quite huge, and it has some fantastic glass windows, the sculptures on the stone walls look great too. I reached there very late. Otherwise I'd go in and take some pictures of the glass windows from inside.
content.zh: Google地图上的照片确实没有骗人，它确实是一座漂亮的教堂，规模还蛮大的。它有几扇琉璃窗非常好看，石墙上的雕塑也非常精美。我到那里的时间已经是非常晚了，不然的话我可能会进去，从里面拍几张琉璃窗的照片。

content.en: And it is not just a beautiful church. Actually it is also the rest place where quite a few Counts and Dukes of Bergisches Land were buried, and it seems to be quite famous among tourists too. However, I don't really like the vibe there. It was really like a well-made place to provide the most relaxing vacation experiences. Everything looks like designed, and they really pops out, instead of just being there, blending into the environment. So I didn't stay there for a long time. After a few pictures of the church itself, I just left.
content.zh: 它也不仅仅是一座漂亮的教堂而已。事实上，它是好几代贝吉舍斯兰大公的安息之所。而且它好像在游客间也算有些名气。不过我并不是太喜欢这里的感觉。因为它有点像是一个精心制造出来的地方，好给人们提供最轻松愉快的度假经历。所有的事物都像是静心设计过的，而且都显得非常突兀，而不是让人感觉它本来就应该在那里，与周围的环境融为一体。所以我没有在那里呆很长时间。简单地给教堂照了几张照片之后，我就离开了。
